topic: Automated Reply " Rendering large space with small detail (small\n picture now attached!)"
body:
This is an automated reply to your message "Re: [Radiance-general] Rendering large space with small detail (small
	picture now attached!)" sent to chris at zed-uk.com.


Dear Paul Chilton <p.chilton at gmail.com>


Thank you for your email. I am away from the office till Friday 22nd May.  I will be receiving my emails, but may not be able to reply to them promptly. If you have an urgent query please contact my colleague Eric Roberts on 0161 3386200 or via email to eric at zed-uk.com.


Thanks


Chris
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2009-May/006001.html).</sup>
